reviews.review_msg: Garth is passionate about what he teaches. I found Garth motivating and inspiring. I wish I had taken classes with Garth earlier (I took my first class with him during my final semester). Like most classes if you do well you tend to like the class. Do the work with Garth and you will hopefully enjoy the class.

There are lots of readings that, at times, can be quite dense but they are thought provoking. Garth has a reputation of being a "jerk" but no other professor has made me think more critically or "outside the box" than him. Yes he can be intimidating but he is by far one of the most approachable and caring professors I have ever had. Recommended.
